mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no ,t.comments ,c.name ,t.name AS t_name ,o.start_time ,o.end_time from orders o INNER JOIN teacher AS t on o.teacher_no = t.teacher_no LEFT JOIN child AS c on o.user_no = c.user_no WHERE o.order_no = #{order_no}

SELECT o.order_no ,t.comments ,c.name ,t.name AS t_name ,o.start_time ,o.end_time from orders o INNER JOIN teacher AS t on o.teacher_no = t.teacher_no LEFT JOIN child AS c on o.user_no = c.user_no WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT c.comment_no , o.order_no , t.comments , c.content , t.name as t_name , date_format(c.created_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as create_dt FROM ilinkcare.orders o INNER JOIN ilinkcare.teacher t ON t.teacher_no = o.teacher_no LEFT JOIN ilinkcare.comment c ON c.order_no = o.order_no WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo}
